actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department.

official_title: A bill to permit until December 31, 1986, the duty-free entry of magnetron tubes used in microwave cooking appliances.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to provide duty-free treatment, through December 31, 1986, on magnetron tubes used in microwave cooking appliances.

titles.title: A bill to permit until December 31, 1986, the duty-free entry of magnetron tubes used in microwave cooking appliances.
